rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with adequate lighting and a small seating area.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room adjacent to the kitchen. Designed for social gatherings and relaxation, ensuring natural light through large windows.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional modern kitchen with ample storage and workspace. Placement ensures a view of the garden.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Elegant dining area adjoining the living room for shared meals.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master suite with an en-suite bathroom and closet space. Oriented to maximize morning sunlight following Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom ensuring privacy and ventilation as per local norms.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom providing adequate space for family members or guests.

rooms.name: Study/Home Office
rooms.description: Well-lit and quiet study area with dedicated storage solutions. Optimally placed away from noisy zones.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom with a separate bathroom to host visitors comfortably.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Entertainment space designed for high-quality acoustics and visual experience. Placed in a quiet corner of the ground floor, away from direct sunlight.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Dedicated room for laundry, storage, and other utilities.
